attributes.action: Change assistance dog regulations and rules
attributes.additional_details: To many fake assistant dogs, and I feel like emotional support. Dogs are technically also assistant dogs of sorts and feel that they should both have equal rights.
attributes.background:
Give emotional support dogs, the same rights as assistant dogs, like they do in the USA, 

Require assistant dogs to be registered like they are in the USA (so it is harder to have a fake assistance dog)
